item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Nice work with the builds, Eric.

item.title: By: 4g63rotary
item.dc:creator: 4g63rotary
item.description:
Yo Eric, I need the biggest of favors to ask of you. I've gone through the searches and have found maybe one or two dash removal guides for the FD but in all honesty they are dated. I know you've removed yours more than once would you have any tips and or tricks to getting this thing out without it crumbling to dust? Even a link to a better guide would work, the one I've seen is the RX7 Boutique one. Thanks for any help given man!
Wendell
item.content:encoded:
Yo Eric, I need the biggest of favors to ask of you. I’ve gone through the searches and have found maybe one or two dash removal guides for the FD but in all honesty they are dated. I know you’ve removed yours more than once would you have any tips and or tricks to getting this thing out without it crumbling to dust?
Even a link to a better guide would work, the one I’ve seen is the RX7 Boutique one.
Thanks for any help given man!

Wendell

item.title: By: Danny
item.dc:creator: Danny
item.description: Yeah. I'm back already in SoCal. It was a short visit. Definitely wanted to hit you up but schedule wasn't permitting since I had a tight timeline. :(
item.content:encoded: Yeah. I’m back already in SoCal. It was a short visit. Definitely wanted to hit you up but schedule wasn’t permitting since I had a tight timeline. :(
